ingredients.ingredient: 1 (3 ounce) package instant pistachio pudding mix
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed

cookingTips: Make this dessert at least 2 hours in advance for best flavor development
Fold ingredients gently with a spatula to maintain whipped topping's airy texture
Reserve some marshmallows and pineapple chunks for garnish on top
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a no-bake dessert salad. Are you looking for something quick and easy for a potluck, or do you have time considerations?
